about_the_game:
The Original Soundtrack of EARTH 2160 will be a treat for your ears! Enjoy the Earth 2160 Sci-Fi Universe apart from visuals and listen to 32 powerful and evocative music tracks with a total playing time of 72 minutes.

PLAYLIST


  • 01. Main Theme (Must Be Strong) -- [02:33]
  • 02. Aliens - Main Theme -- [01:50]
  • 03. Aliens Fraction -- [02:56]
  • 04. Ambient 01 -- [03:11]

  • 08. Ambient 05 -- [03:27]
  • 09. ED - Main Theme -- [02:06]
  • 10. ED Fraction -- [03:22]
  • 11. Day 01 -- [03:29]

  • 13. Day 03 -- [02:46]
  • 14. Day 04 -- [03:03]
  • 15. Day 05 -- [02:45]
  • 16. Day 06 -- [02:53]
  • 17. Defeat Theme -- [01:07]
  • 18. LC - Main Theme -- [01:49]
  • 19. LC Fraction -- [02:45]
  • 20. UCS - Main Theme -- [02:06]
  • 21. UCS Fraction -- [03:07]
  • 22. Victory Theme -- [01:18]
  • 23. War 01 -- [00:56]
  • 24. War 02 -- [01:09]
  • 25. War 03 -- [01:04]
  • 26. War 04 -- [01:26]
  • 27. War 05 -- [01:07]
  • 28. War 06 -- [00:55]

  • 30. War 08 -- [01:06]
  • 31. War 09 -- [01:50]
  • 32. End Credits (Live Your Life) -- [02:48]

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Intel/AMD Single Core CPU
  • 512 MB RAM
  • Any graphics card, OS compatible
  • Any sound card, OS compatible
  • 150 MB free disk space
  • Keyboard and Mouse
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Intel/AMD Dual Core CPU
  • 2 GB RAM
  • Any graphics card, OS compatible
  • Any sound card, OS compatible
  • 150 MB free disk space
  • Keyboard and Mouse

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Intel Mac Single Core CPU
  • 512 MB RAM
  • Any graphics card, OS compatible
  • Any sound card, OS compatible
  • 150 MB free disk space
  • Keyboard and Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Intel Mac Dual Core CPU
  • 2 GB RAM
  • Any graphics card, OS compatible
  • Any sound card, OS compatible
  • 150 MB free disk space
  • Keyboard and Mouse

name: Earth 2160 - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Intel/AMD Single Core CPU
  • 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX 9.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX compatible sound card
  • 150 MB free disk space
  • Keyboard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Intel/AMD Dual Core CPU
  • 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX 9.0 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX compatible sound card
  • 150 MB free disk space
  • Keyboard and Mouse

short_description: The Original Soundtrack of EARTH 2160 will be a treat for your ears! Enjoy the Earth 2160 Sci-Fi Universe apart from visuals and listen to 32 powerful and evocative music tracks with a total playing time of 72 minutes.
